Package LimakWebApp.ServerSide

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • LimakWebApp.ServerSide.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object

    Server

    This class provides clients authorization and handles all networking on server's side
    Since:
    12.06.2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kamil Chrustowski

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void acceptClients​()
      This method accepts new sockets in loop.
      void clearUpConnection​()
      This method destroys all connections
      java.lang.Thread getAuthThread​()
      This method gives access to instance of authorization thread.
      Controller getController​()
      Returns Controller of Server.
      void processSocket​(java.net.Socket socket)
      This method serves given socket in separated thread.
      void quit​()
      Quits app and clears connections

      This method removes from threadList CommunicationServiceThreadHandler which is supposed to be closed.

      This method sets the reference to authorization thread

      This method sets Controller for Server.
      void setItTimeToStop​(boolean value)
      This method sets boolean flag to given value to stop or not process of accepting new sockets.

      This method finds connection assigned to user and shares file to user

        Returns Controller of Server.

        This method sets Controller for Server.

      • quit

        public void quit​()
        Quits app and clears connections

      • clearUpConnection

        public void clearUpConnection​()
        This method destroys all connections

      • processSocket

        public void processSocket​(java.net.Socket socket)
        This method serves given socket in separated thread. Performs authorization of single connection and rejects or accepts new client.
        Parameters:
        socket - Accepted socket to authorize

      • acceptClients

        public void acceptClients​()
        This method accepts new sockets in loop.

      • shareToUser

        public void shareToUser​(CredentialPacket to,
                        java.lang.String item)
        This method finds connection assigned to user and shares file to user
        Parameters:
        to - User - the future owner of file
        item - item to share

      • removeHandlerById

        public void removeHandlerById​(java.lang.String ID)
        This method removes from threadList CommunicationServiceThreadHandler which is supposed to be closed.
        Parameters:
        ID - ID of CommunicationServiceThreadHandler

      • setItTimeToStop

        public void setItTimeToStop​(boolean value)
        This method sets boolean flag to given value to stop or not process of accepting new sockets.
        Parameters:
        value - value to set

      • setAuthThread

        public void setAuthThread​(java.lang.Thread authThread)
        This method sets the reference to authorization thread
        Parameters:
        authThread - Reference to thread

      • getAuthThread

        public java.lang.Thread getAuthThread​()
        This method gives access to instance of authorization thread.
        Returns:
        Thread
